    • Method Detail

      • invokeMethod

        static Object invokeMethod(Object object,
                           String regEx,
                           int patternFlag)
                    throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method detects a method by input name and returns the invoked result of the method.
        Parameters:
        object - is the object, which the method is invoked from.
        regEx - is the regular expression, which should be matched with the method name.
        patternFlag - is the flag to configure the matching radius (e.g. Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE). Set to 0 if not necessary.
        Returns:
        the invoked method object.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the method could not detected or the invocation of the detected method failed.

      • invokeMethods

        static Set<Object> invokeMethods(Object object,
                                 String regEx,
                                 int patternFlag)
                          throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method returns an invoked method set, which are matching with the regular expressions.
        Parameters:
        object - is the object, which the method is invoked from.
        regEx - is the regular expression, which should be matched with the method name.
        patternFlag - is the flag to configure the matching radius (e.g. Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE). Set to 0 if not necessary.
        Returns:
        a set of invoked method objects.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the method could not detected or the invocation of the detected method failed.

      • detectMethod

        static Method detectMethod(Class<?> inputClass,
                           String regEx,
                           int patternFlag)
                    throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method detects the method of an object class by the input regular expression.
        Parameters:
        inputClass - is the class object, which contains the method.
        regEx - is the regular expression, which should be matched with the method name.
        patternFlag - is the flag to configure the matching radius (e.g. Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE). Set to 0 if not necessary.
        Returns:
        the matched method object.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the input is null or the method could not explicit detected, because of no matching method or more than one matching methods.

      • detectMethods

        static Set<Method> detectMethods(Class<?> inputClass,
                                 String regEx,
                                 int patternFlag)
                          throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method detects the methods of an object class by the input regular expression.
        Parameters:
        inputClass - is the class object, which contains the method.
        regEx - is the regular expression, which should be matched with the method name.
        patternFlag - is the flag to configure the matching radius (e.g. Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE). Set to 0 if not necessary.
        Returns:
        a set of methods, which are matched with the regular expression.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the input parameter are null or there is no matching method.
